hanzi-su-wiki:
頃

Значения

Время; случай

Мнемоника

Некоторое время, необходимое человеку 匕 для поворота головы 頁.

Варианты

顷, 倾, 傾
purpleculture_pinyin:
qīng
variant of 倾
вариант 倾

qǐng
unit of area equal to 100 亩 or 6.67 hectares; a short while; a little while ago; circa. (for approximate dates)
единица площади 100 или 6,67 га; короткое время; недавно; около. (приблизительные даты)
rtega_mnemonic:
頃頃RS
顷顷		time, about, toward, incline
  • RS. a man 匕 leaning his head 頁: incline; only for a short time
purpleculture_examples:

頃刻間 [ qǐng kè jiān ]: in an instant

heisig_keyword: about that time | примерно в то время
heisig_chinese_memo: I used to think 100 chinese acres was the distance you could throw a spoon and still see it with your head.
heisig_constituent: about that time, spoon, sitting on the ground, head, page, one, ceiling, drop, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
heisig_story: When Uncle Bob starts his comic routine of sticking spoons on his head, you know it is about that time to come up with a reason to excuse yourself.
koohiiStory1: An alarm clock with a unique design: You set it for, say, 7:00 am, and at about that time the clock reaches out with a spoon and hits you on the head.
koohiiStory2: After spooning for hours it´s about that time he got some head. Dayum woman.
jp_example_words:
頃(けい): time, about, toward, approximately (time)
この頃(このごろ): recently
年頃(としごろ): age, marriageable age, age of puberty, adolescence, for some years
日頃(ひごろ): normally, habitually
一頃(ひところ): once, some time ago
頃(ころ): time, about, toward, approximately (time)
近頃(ちかごろ): lately, recently, nowadays
手頃(てごろ): moderate, handy
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A spoon to measure a geoduck is a very approximate measurement. Geoducks are big, spoons are small. Still, we'll get the approximation going, right?
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Do the comparison. A spoonful of geoduck aka a whole geoduck on a spoon. This is a spoonful, right? This is what the recipe wanted, I think...
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Maybe this is too much geoduck, even if we're going for an approximate. So, you take the core (ころ) of the geoduck and measure that instead.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: That's a little better. Not too much geoduck. Still a lot, but more like an approximate.
Ru_Radicals: ハ, 匕 (ложка), 目 (глаз), 貝 (раковина), 頁 (страница)
Ru_trainchinese: qǐng: (графема/сч.слово) (книжн.) короткий промежуток времени; только что; (о времени) около, примерно; (единица площади) цин
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the page (頁) uses the spoon (匕) at the right time
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: In the future magic spoons will transport bodies by picking them up by the head.  They travel 100 Chinese acres per second.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " dagger ", from " page ", it means that the head is not straight. "Said Wen": "The head is not straight. From the page of the dagger." Duan Yucai's note: "The dagger, the corners of the head are not square, so the head is not right. "Once it is done, it will be abolished."

" Heng " can mean tilt, the same as " tilt ." "Han Shu·Wang Bao Biography": "It is because the holy king does not look all over but sees it, not just hearing it, but hearing it."

" Heng " can be used as a quantifier to indicate a unit of land area. "Guanzi·Kudu": "Hundred vehicles are ten thousand hectares of cultivated land, ten thousand households, one hundred thousand openings, ten thousand people who should be divided, one hundred riders, four hundred horses.

" Heng " also means a short time. "Xun Zi‧ Zheng Lun": "For example, it is like painting the rivers and seas with bricks, and wearing Taishan with the coke. It is not waiting for a moment to fall and break." Yang Yan's note: "Hear, a short time."

" Heng " also refers to the past. "Hanshu‧ Gouxiuzhi": "Those who are so wide and harmless, the Tun River is connected, and the two rivers are divided. Now the Tun River is blocked, and the mouth of the Lingming calf is not good, and the only river is the responsibility of several rivers. Even though the embankment is high, it will never let it go."
humanum_short_description_en: From " dagger ", from " page ", it means that the head is not straight.
humanum_full_description:
從「匕」，從「頁」，表示頭不正。《說文》：「頭不正也。从匕从頁。」 段玉裁注：「匕，頭角而不正方，故頭不正從匕曰頃。引伸為凡傾仄不正之偁。今則『傾』行而『頃』廢。」

　　「頃」可表示傾斜，同「傾」。《漢書‧王褒傳》：「是以聖王不遍窺望而視已明，不單頃耳而聽已聰。」

　　「頃」可用作量詞，表示土地面積單位。《管子‧揆度》：「百乘為耕田萬頃，為戶萬戶，為開口十萬人，為當分者萬人，為輕車百乘，為馬四百匹。」

　　「頃」還表示短時間。《荀子‧正論》：「譬之是猶以塼涂塞江海也，以焦僥而戴太山也，蹎跌碎折不待頃矣。」楊倞注：「頃，少頃也。」

　　「頃」也指往昔。《漢書‧溝洫志》：「頃所以闊無大害者，以屯氏河通，兩川分流也。今屯氏河塞，靈鳴犢口又益不利，獨一川兼受數河之任，雖高增隄防，終不能泄。」

從「 匕 」，從「 頁 」，表示頭不正。《說文》：「頭不正也。从匕从頁。」 段玉裁注：「匕，頭角而不正方，故頭不正從匕曰頃。引伸為凡傾仄不正之偁。今則『傾』行而『頃』廢。」 「 頃 」可表示傾斜，同「 傾 」。《漢書‧王褒傳》：「是以聖王不遍窺望而視已明，不單頃耳而聽已聰。」 「 頃 」可用作量詞，表示土地面積單位。《管子‧揆度》：「百乘為耕田萬頃，為戶萬戶，為開口十萬人，為當分者萬人，為輕車百乘，為馬四百匹。」 「 頃 」還表示短時間。《荀子‧正論》：「譬之是猶以塼涂塞江海也，以焦僥而戴太山也，蹎跌碎折不待頃矣。」楊倞注：「頃，少頃也。」 「 頃 」也指往昔。《漢書‧溝洫志》：「頃所以闊無大害者，以屯氏河通，兩川分流也。今屯氏河塞，靈鳴犢口又益不利，獨一川兼受數河之任，雖高增隄防，終不能泄。」
From " dagger", from " page", it means that the head is not straight. "Said Wen": "The head is not straight. From the page of the dagger." Duan Yucai's note: "The dagger, the corners of the head are not square, so the head is not right. "Once it is done, it will be abolished." " Heng" can mean tilt, the same as " tilt." "Han Shu·Wang Bao Biography": "It is because the holy king does not look all over but sees it, not just hearing it, but hearing it." " Heng" can be used as a quantifier to indicate a unit of land area. "Guanzi·Kudu": "Hundred vehicles are ten thousand hectares of cultivated land, ten thousand households, one hundred thousand openings, ten thousand people who should be divided, one hundred riders, four hundred horses. " Heng" also means a short time. "Xun Zi‧ Zheng Lun": "For example, it is like painting the rivers and seas with bricks, and wearing Taishan with the coke. It is not waiting for a moment to fall and break." Yang Yan's note: "Hear, a short time." " Heng" also refers to the past. "Hanshu‧ Gouxiuzhi": "Those who are so wide and harmless, the Tun River is connected, and the two rivers are divided. Now the Tun River is blocked, and the mouth of the Lingming calf is not good, and the only river is the responsibility of several rivers. Even though the embankment is high, it will never let it go."

вм. 顷
Radicals: 匕, 頁  (spoon, geoduck)
Meaning Mnemonic
A spoon to measure a geoduck is a very approximate measurement. Geoducks are big, spoons are small. Still, we'll get the approximation going, right?
Do the comparison. A spoonful of geoduck aka a whole geoduck on a spoon. This is a spoonful, right? This is what the recipe wanted, I think...
Reading Mnemonic
Maybe this is too much geoduck, even if we're going for an approximate. So, you take the core (ころ) of the geoduck and measure that instead.
That's a little better. Not too much geoduck. Still a lot, but more like an approximate.
